body:
I personally am a fan of the vintage classics, such as Dragon Ball Z and Pokemon. Post your suggestions here :P

Hey my friend, who is an otaku, is asking you guys to rate your favorite anime shows, her favorite is Attack on Titan and Sword Art Online. Go crazy guys and keep the fire burning.
